summary: Encode multiline swarm-job payloads for enforced command policy

changes.description: Swarm replicated-job helpers now rewrite multiline `sh -c`/`sh -lc` payloads into single-line base64-decoded wrappers before `docker service create`, so support runbooks continue to work under the enforced command policy.
Magento SCD DB snapshot generation no longer fails on manager nodes with `argv contains unsafe characters` when the exporter script is passed through the shared swarm-job helper.
